title: More Omega Squad Skins
body: I would really love to see some more Omega Squad skins, especially one for Twitch. Please get onto this right away.

replies.body: An Omega Squad skin for yordles would be amazing, not too sure if Twitch would fit it at all lorewise but it'd look killer.

I know it wouldn't fit, lore-wise, but... I want it so bad. All of his skins are so terrible, he needs some sweet loving. Even if they make an Omega Squad equivalent, while calling it something else... that will be enough for me.
